Installation¶

Windows¶

The latest Tellurium-*.exe is available on github.

Mac¶

The latest Tellurium-*.dmg is available on github.

Linux¶

Currently there is no packed linux installation. The dependencies and libraries have to be installed separately. Install from source code.
